DOC.brief_title: Effects Hypertonic Dextrose Water Injection Supraspinatus Tendinosis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Supraspinatus tendinosis degenerative process tendon . It cause external trauma episode imbalanced self-repair process . It cause patient shoulder pain shoulder head exercise heavy lifting . It also influence sleep quality due pain symptom shoulder . Usually patient limited response medication physical modality . Moreover , cause shoulder tear rupture , disability age . Prolotherapy injection therapy chronic painful musculoskeletal condition . It involve injection small volume irritant agent , commonly hyperosmolar dextrose solution , multiple painful tendon ligament insertion connect bone , several treatment session . The injection irritant solution initiate inflammatory cascade site injection , cause fibroblast proliferation subsequent collagen synthesis , result strong tendon ligament . Hyperosmolar dextrose appear commonly use agent today , morrhuate sodium use slightly less often . There promise recent evidence prolotherapy , hyperosmolar dextrose treat painful tendinopathies . The aim study hypertonic injection supraspinatus tendinosis patient clinical ultrasound image presentation . The investigator conduct double blind randomize control trial 60 participant chronic shoulder pain 3 month supraspinatus tendinosis . In study group , 4 injection 20 % dextrose water injection supraspinatus tendon 2 week interval 8 week control group receive normal saline . SPADI , VAS ultrasound data obtain intervention , 6month 12 month enrol study . The ANOVA independent test apply analysis SPSS 20.0 P value le 0.05 statistical significance .
